builtinfs.name: callExists()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a specific call exists
builtinfs.signature: BooleanItem callExists(ClassItem c, String callerClass, String invocation)

builtinfs.name: classExists()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a class exists

builtinfs.name: getArg()
builtinfs.purpose: Get an argument from a call/method
builtinfs.signature: List<StringItem> getArg(ClassItem c, String callerClass, String methodName, int argIdx) | List<StringItem> getArg(ClassItem c, String constructorInvocation, Integer argIdx)

builtinfs.name: getClasses()
builtinfs.purpose: Get a collection of classes

builtinfs.name: getConstructors()
builtinfs.purpose: Get constructors of a class

builtinfs.name: getFamily()
builtinfs.purpose: Get type hierarchy/family information

builtinfs.name: getFields()
builtinfs.purpose: Get fields of a class

builtinfs.name: getFQN()
builtinfs.purpose: Get fully qualified name

builtinfs.name: getMethods()
builtinfs.purpose: Get methods of a class

builtinfs.name: getName()
builtinfs.purpose: Get the simple name/identifier

builtinfs.name: getReturnType()
builtinfs.purpose: Get a method's return type

builtinfs.name: getType()
builtinfs.purpose: Get type information

builtinfs.name: hasField()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a class has a specific field

builtinfs.name: hasParam()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a method has a specific parameter

builtinfs.name: hasParamType()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a method has a parameter of a given type

builtinfs.name: indexInBound()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether an index is within bounds

builtinfs.name: isIterable()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a type is iterable

builtinfs.name: isLibraryClass()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether the class comes from libraries

builtinfs.name: isUniqueSN()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether the simple name is unique

builtinfs.name: locateClassSN()
builtinfs.purpose: Locate a class by simple name

builtinfs.name: locateClassFQN()
builtinfs.purpose: Locate a class by fully qualified name

builtinfs.name: getAnnoAttr()
builtinfs.purpose: Get an annotation attribute value
builtinfs.signature: List<StringItem> getAnnoAttr(ClassItem c, String annotation, String attr) | List<StringItem> getAnnoAttr(ClassItem c, MethodItem m, String annotation, String attr)

builtinfs.name: getAnnoAttrNames()
builtinfs.purpose: Get the set of annotation attribute names

builtinfs.name: getAnnotated()
builtinfs.purpose: Get elements annotated with a given annotation

builtinfs.name: hasAnnotation()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether an element has a given annotation
builtinfs.signature: BooleanItem hasAnnotation(ClassItem c, String annotation) | BooleanItem hasAnnotation(MethodItem m, String annotation)

builtinfs.name: hasAnnoAttr()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether an annotation attribute exists
builtinfs.signature: BooleanItem hasAnnoAttr(ClassItem classItem, String annotation, String attr)

builtinfs.name: elementExists()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether an XML element exists

builtinfs.name: getAttr()
builtinfs.purpose: Get an XML attribute value

builtinfs.name: getAttrs()
builtinfs.purpose: Get a set of XML attributes

builtinfs.name: getElms()
builtinfs.purpose: Get a set of XML elements

builtinfs.name: getXMLs()
builtinfs.purpose: Get XML documents/fragments

builtinfs.name: hasAttr()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether an XML attribute exists

builtinfs.name: endsWith()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a string ends with a suffix

builtinfs.name: isEmpty()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a string/collection is empty
builtinfs.signature: BooleanItem isEmpty(List list) | BooleanItem isEmpty(String item) | BooleanItem isEmpty(ClassItem classItem)

builtinfs.name: indexOf()
builtinfs.purpose: Return the index of a substring/element

builtinfs.name: join()
builtinfs.purpose: Join/concatenate values

builtinfs.name: pathExists()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a filesystem/project path exists

builtinfs.name: substring()
builtinfs.purpose: Extract a substring
builtinfs.signature: StringItem subString(String str, int st) | StringItem subString(String str, int st, int en)

builtinfs.name: startsWith()
builtinfs.purpose: Check whether a string starts with a prefix

builtinfs.name: upperCase()
builtinfs.purpose: Convert a string to upper case

builtinfs.name: getArgCount()
builtinfs.purpose: Get the number of arguments for a method

builtinfs.name: hasDuplicateBeans()
builtinfs.purpose: Check if there are multiple beans for the same class

builtinfs.name: objectCreated()
builtinfs.purpose: Check if the constructor was used to create any object

builtinfs.name: importsClass()
builtinfs.purpose: Check if a class imports another class

builtinfs.name: extendsClass()
builtinfs.purpose: Check if a class extends another class
